abstract: Partners at the firm sold 655,120 shares in the two months ending in late January, regulatory filings show, reducing their ownership stake to about 10 percent.
snippet: Partners at the firm sold 655,120 shares in the two months ending in late January, regulatory filings show, reducing their ownership stake to about 10 percent.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs partners have sold $108 million in shares in recent months, driving their total ownership stake in the Wall Street firm down to about 10 percent from 11.2 percent.

headline.main: Goldman Partners Sell Shares, and Their Stake Slides
